topic.title: Linkus Android Version
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Linkus client Android version.

ul.li: We added Provacy Policy Agreement on the Linkus client.
Added supported for inviting multiple members in a conference.
Improved the user experience.
Optimized audio calls through Bluetooth.
Fixed the issue that after you disconnected a Linkus call, there would be no sound on other applications on your phone.
Added email login method.
Added Help documents in Linkus.
Improved the login security.
Optimized the user experience of receiving calls and ending calls.
Optimized call logs.
Optimized Debug function.
Fixed the recording issue on Android 4.4.
Fixed the issue that Linkus would log out automatically.
Added support for displaying the name of mobile phone contact when a Linkus call comes.
Added support for MiPush, Huawei Push, and JPush.
Added Background Mode setting.
Optimized number rewriting feature: users can directly rewrite the contact’s number on Linkus, then dial the customized number.
Fixed the Linkus dial pad issue: searching contacts by name could not work when users were trying to add a conference member.
Fixed the Linkus dial pad issue: there was no keypad tone when dialing number during conference or making a second-dial.
Compatible with Yeastar Cloud PBX.
Fixed the issue that the call answering screen wouldn’t show when the phone was locked and slide to unlock had been enabled.
Added Call Waiting feature.
Added support for Italian and German User Interface.
Improved call stability.
Optimized Call Push feature and improved success rate of pushing incoming call.
Optimized feature for answering a Linkus call via Bluetooth headset: users can answer a Linkus call by pressing the corresponding button on Bluetooth headsets or ordinary headsets.
Added Conference feature.
Optimized Call Push feature: when the phone screen is locked, users can answer incoming calls directly without an unlock operation.
Improved Linkus security: users would be forced to change the Linkus login password after login.
Added support for Russian User Interface.
Added compatibility with K2 VoIP PBX Linkus server.
Improved the stability of Linkus client.
Added support for Turkish User Interface.
Fixed the login issue: if you entered both local IP and remote IP in the login page, you could not log in Linkus via an external Wi-Fi network.
Added support for checking voicemail.
Added Linkus debug feature.
Added support for Google FCM (FireBase Cloud Messaging) service.
Added support for answering and terminating a Linkus call via Bluetooth headset.
Deleted “Call Waiting” setting.
Fixed the issue that the Linkus client could not get time zone for some areas.
Fixed the issue users could not log in Linkus client via domain name.
Fixed the flashback issue on Linkus client, improved the stability of the Linkus client.
Added support for logging in Linkus client via QR scan code or login link.
Added support for checking and playing one-touch recording files on Linkus client.
Added blind transfer feature.
Limit Linkus login attempts 5 times to protect Linkus from brute force attacks.
Added support for Turkish interface.
Added support for enabling and disabling Dialpad Touch Tones.
Optimized loading speed of extension status.
Fixed the issue that Linkus client could not connect to the server after upgrading the Linkus App.
